!Warehouse Chief Natools: I had originally planned to give you several more missions to prove yourself worthy of being a high-level agent. But the situation has changed, and I now need your assistance with a particularly sensitive and important mission. On the basis of my personal authority, I hereby confer on you the title of high-level agent. [Quest _141_ShadowFoxPart3 30894-10.htm|"Can I meet Shadow Fox now?"]
